orig_text: Since P1 has no root to PE2, PE1 needs to originate an mLDP message with a FEC element that identifies ASBR1 as the root.
correct_text: Since P1 has no route to PE2, PE1 needs to originate an mLDP message with a FEC element that identifies ASBR1 as the root.
notes:
"no root to PE2" does not parse and looks as a typo. 
And it is quite clear from the context that "no route to PE2" is intended.

orig_text: PE1 also has this Inter-AS I-PMSI A-D route.
correct_text: PE1 also has this Intra-AS I-PMSI A-D route.
notes: "PE1 also has this route" refers to "Although ASBR1 does not have a route to PE2, it does have a BGP Intra-AS Inclusive PMSI (I-PMSI) auto-discovery (A-D) route". Intra-AS mechanisms are used for auto-discovery/binding for Non-Segmented Inter-AS Tunnels.
